# dependency-hell [![CI - Scala Steward](https://github.com/anand-singh/dependency-hell/actions/workflows/scala-steward.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/anand-singh/dependency-hell/actions/workflows/scala-steward.yml) [![Scala Steward badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Scala_Steward-helping-blue.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://scala-steward.org)
A bot powered by Scala Steward that helps you keep library dependencies and sbt plugins up-to-date.
